Pre-Game Insights: Experts predict a close match similar to the Copa America final, where both teams are strong favorites to qualify for the World Cup.
Colombia has a strong record of not losing in their home matches, while Argentina has an unbeaten record in away qualifiers since 2017.
Key players to watch include Luis Diaz for Colombia and Lionel Messi for Argentina.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is the repeat of the Copa America final, adding historical context to the rivalry.
Both teams are expected to qualify for the World Cup, with Argentina leading the group and Colombia closely following.
